text: @Mike_Pence Unless the children are locked up in cages.  Or children who will be exposed to coronavirus in crowded classrooms.  Or the children were exposed to uncontrolled gun violence, or were born to parents who are now unemployed as a result of Trump’s poor response to the pandemic.
